title.narrative: Save The Children Tibet Basic Education Programme phase 5

description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to improve the quality of education and thereby, the learning outcomes in rural primary schools in Tibet Autonomous Region (TAR) with a particular focus on students falling behind in order to promote the capacity of the Tibetan people to develop and influence their own future. This phase of the project focuses on the sustainability and on institutionalising the work on learner-centred teaching methods with Lhasa Municipal Education Bureau (LMED), Prefecture Education Bureau (PEB), County Education Bureau (CEB), Lhasa Advanced Teacher Training School (LATTS) and at school level. The project is based on the accumulated results achieved and lessons learned from Save the Children’s ten years of experience in improving education in TAR in close cooperation with local partners.
